mapper.select: SELECT a.article_id AS articleId, a.title AS title, a.time AS time, a.view_number AS viewNumber, a.comment_number AS commentNumber, a.category AS category, a.pic AS pic, u.user_icon AS icon, u.user_name AS userName, p.paiwei AS paiwei, p.img AS img FROM article a INNER JOIN user u ON u.open_id = a.open_id INNER JOIN pace p ON u.open_id = p.open_id WHERE a.is_pass = 0
